message.name: INF_SUPPLIERRETURNS_NEGATIVE_ITEMS
message.locale: The number of Service Supplier Return line items cannot be negative or zero.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNHEADER_FV_PRODUCT
message.locale: The product entered is not an order type product.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNHEADER_FV_RECEIPTDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: A receipt date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNHEADER_FV_RECEIPTDATE
message.locale: The receipt date cannot be later than today's date.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNHEADER_FV_ZEROAMOUNT
message.locale: The total amount of the return must be greater than zero.
